comments:
On site.xml: SiteMap. 
Click Build
Get error unable to find plugin ...
Click OK
Click cancel. It leaves the dialog up. This "never" finishes.
Click run in background. It raises another dialog: User operation is waiting
containing two entries. 1) PDE Export (cancelled.) 2) Plug-in development 
site.xml.
Click the red square of 1). It grays it out, but doesn't lower the dialog.
Click the red square of 2). The dialog disappears. The log says: 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-03-01 12:56:08.787
